var render = function render() {
  var _vm = this,
    _c = _vm._self._c
  return _c(
    "ContentSlotsDistributor",
    { attrs: { "slot-key": _vm.$parent.slotKey } },
    [
      _c("h2", { attrs: { id: "notifications" } }, [
        _c(
          "a",
          { staticClass: "header-anchor", attrs: { href: "#notifications" } },
          [_vm._v("#")]
        ),
        _vm._v(" Notifications"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v(
          "FundMaster communicates, internally and externally, through an advanced notification system using emails, SMS, or both. The system allows an administrator to configure a notification matrix (i.e., what key system activities need notifications) and set up email templates for sending messages to the target audience concerning issues such as password reset alerts."
        ),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("h2", { attrs: { id: "notifications-config-matrix" } }, [
        _c(
          "a",
          {
            staticClass: "header-anchor",
            attrs: { href: "#notifications-config-matrix" },
          },
          [_vm._v("#")]
        ),
        _vm._v(" Notifications Config Matrix"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v("Clicking the "),
        _c("strong", [_vm._v("Notifications")]),
        _vm._v(
          " link labeled 3, will display a drop-down menu from which the "
        ),
        _c("strong", [_vm._v("Notifications Config Matrix")]),
        _vm._v(" link is accessed. Click this link to display a "),
        _c("strong", [_vm._v("Send Notifications on?")]),
        _vm._v(
          " form where a user is allowed to select the key events and activities for which notification messages ought to be sent."
        ),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v("Check the "),
        _c("strong", [_vm._v("Yes")]),
        _vm._v(" or "),
        _c("strong", [_vm._v("No")]),
        _vm._v(
          " checkbox on the listed items enclosed under label 1, otherwise, choose whether to make the configurations global or not under the text box labeled 2 as shown in the screenshot below:"
        ),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("img", {
        staticClass: "center",
        attrs: {
          alt: "notification configuration matrix image",
          width: "80%",
          height: "auto",
          src: require("../.vuepress/public/img/media/adfd5.png"),
        },
      }),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [_c("strong", [_vm._v("Action")])]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("ul", [
        _c("li", [
          _c("p", [
            _vm._v("Tick the appropriate checkbox – "),
            _c("strong", [_vm._v("Yes")]),
            _vm._v(" or "),
            _c("strong", [_vm._v("No")]),
            _vm._v(" under the encloser "),
            _c("strong", [_vm._v("labeled 1")]),
            _vm._v(" to determine which action to send notification."),
          ]),
        ]),
        _vm._v(" "),
        _c("li", [
          _c("p", [
            _vm._v("Select "),
            _c("strong", [_vm._v("Yes")]),
            _vm._v(" or "),
            _c("strong", [_vm._v("No")]),
            _vm._v(" in the drop-down menu "),
            _c("strong", [_vm._v("labeled 2")]),
            _vm._v(
              " to determine the scope of application of the configurations."
            ),
          ]),
        ]),
        _vm._v(" "),
        _c("li", [
          _c("p", [
            _vm._v("Click the "),
            _c("strong", [_vm._v("Save")]),
            _vm._v(
              " button to confirm the configurations, otherwise close the form."
            ),
          ]),
        ]),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("h2", { attrs: { id: "creatining-notifications-templates" } }, [
        _c(
          "a",
          {
            staticClass: "header-anchor",
            attrs: { href: "#creatining-notifications-templates" },
          },
          [_vm._v("#")]
        ),
        _vm._v(" Creatining Notifications Templates"),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v(
          "The system allows administrators to design notifications templates in such a way that instead of writing a notification to every recipient individually, keywords (e.g., member name, member number etc. are dynamically embedded in a message from the database to enable sending of a copy to a list of members in a click. See a grid table listing available templates on the screenshot below:"
        ),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("img", {
        staticClass: "center",
        attrs: {
          alt: "notifications template image",
          width: "90%",
          height: "auto",
          src: require("../.vuepress/public/img/media/adfd6.png"),
        },
      }),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [_c("strong", [_vm._v("Action")])]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("ul", [
        _c("li", [
          _c("p", [
            _vm._v("Click "),
            _c("strong", [_vm._v("label 1")]),
            _vm._v(" button to add a new template"),
          ]),
        ]),
        _vm._v(" "),
        _c("li", [
          _c("p", [
            _vm._v("Click "),
            _c("strong", [_vm._v("label 2")]),
            _vm._v(" button to view the details of a selected template"),
          ]),
        ]),
        _vm._v(" "),
        _c("li", [
          _c("p", [
            _vm._v("Click "),
            _c("strong", [_vm._v("label 3")]),
            _vm._v(" button to delete a selected template from the system"),
          ]),
        ]),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [
        _vm._v("Clicking the "),
        _c("strong", [_vm._v("New")]),
        _vm._v(
          " button will open a dialogue box where a new email notification template can be configured as shown below:"
        ),
      ]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("img", {
        staticClass: "center",
        attrs: {
          alt: "notifications template design",
          width: "90%",
          height: "auto",
          src: require("../.vuepress/public/img/media2/notificationtempdesign.png"),
        },
      }),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("p", [_c("strong", [_vm._v("Tip")])]),
      _vm._v(" "),
      _c("ul", [
        _c("li", [
          _vm._v(
            "Make use of reserved keywords by selecting them from the drop-down box menu located above the message body and use then inside the message as shown above."
          ),
        ]),
      ]),
    ]
  )
}
var staticRenderFns = []
render._withStripped = true

export { render, staticRenderFns }
